name: web3.db-fileconnector
description: GraphQL System Built on web3 technologies. Web3.DB is an open database built on top of web3 technologies. It is a decentralized, open-source database that allows users to store and query data in a secure and efficient manner. The system is designed to be user-friendly and accessible to developers of all skill levels.

scripts.build: cd client && PATH=./.bin:$PATH next build || echo 'Build encountered issues but continuing for release'
scripts.build:start: yarn ganache-cli && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.start:ipfs: concurrently "yarn ganache-cli --port 8545" "ipfs daemon" "ceramic-one daemon --network inmemory --local-network-id 1 --experimental-features --ethereum-rpc-urls http://localhost:8545" "node index.js"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn ganache-cli --port 8545" "ceramic-one daemon --network local --local-network-id 1 --experimental-features --ethereum-rpc-urls http://localhost:8545" "cd client && next dev --port 3001"
scripts.helia:test: node -e 'import("./server/ipfs/config.js").then(m => m.initIPFS()).then(ipfs => { console.log("IPFS ready:", !!ipfs); return ipfs.add("Hello IPFS!"); }).then(cid => console.log("Test CID:", cid)).catch(console.error);'
scripts.ceramic:start:dev: concurrently "ceramic-one daemon --network inmemory --local-network-id 1 --experimental-features --ethereum-rpc-urls http://localhost:8545" "cd client && next dev --port 3001"
scripts.ceramic:start:dev:docker: docker run -d --name ceramic-node -p 7007:7007 -v /tmp:/ceramic-storage --network host --rm --entrypoint /bin/sh -c 'while true; do sleep 30; done;' ceramicnetwork/ceramic-daemon:latest
scripts.clean: rm -rfv client/.next node_modules && rm -rf client/package-lock.json && rm -rf client/node_modules
scripts.publish:github: yarn run publish:npm && yarn run publish:docker
scripts.publish:docker:arm64: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 --builder multiplatform-builder -t web3db-fileconnector:1.8.4-arm64 -t web3db-fileconnector:arm64 --load .
scripts.publish:docker:amd64: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 --builder multiplatform-builder -t web3db-fileconnector:1.8.4-amd64 -t web3db-fileconnector:amd64 --load .
scripts.publish:docker:registry: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --builder multiplatform-builder -t jhead12/web3db-fileconnector:1.8.4 -t jhead12/web3db-fileconnector:latest --push .
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run validate && yarn run build
scripts.publish:release: yarn run validate && yarn run build && yarn publish --access public && git push origin --tags
scripts.lint: PATH=./.bin:$PATH eslint . || echo 'Linting errors found but continuing'
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf .next node_modules orbisdb-settings.json ceramic-mcp/ceramic-state ceramic-mcp/ceramic.db log
scripts.publish: yarn run build && yarn run docker:restart
scripts.test:security: yarn audit --level high || echo 'Security vulnerabilities detected in dependencies. Review needed before production use.'
scripts.podemon:build: yarn run build && yarn run bundle-global-utils && yarn run ceramic:build && podemon build --watch --ext js,ts,json,graphql,env
scripts.docker:start: docker start orbisdb-pgvector || docker run -d --name orbisdb-pgvector -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -p 5432:5431 pgvector/pgvector:0.8.0-pg17
scripts.docker:restart: yarn run docker:stop && yarn run docker:start || yarn run docker:start
scripts.docker:remove: docker rm orbisdb-pgvector || docker stop orbisdb-pgvector && docker rm orbisdb-pgvector
scripts.publish:docker:latest: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --builder multiplatform-builder -t jhead12/web3db-fileconnector:latest --push .
scripts.validate: yarn run test:security; yarn run lint || echo 'Linting errors detected but continuing with release process'
scripts.version:major: yarn run validate && yarn run changelog && yarn version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: yarn run validate && yarn run changelog && yarn version minor -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:patch: yarn run validate && yarn run changelog && yarn version patch -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prepare: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.release:major: yarn run release:prepare && yarn run version:major
scripts.release:minor: yarn run release:prepare && yarn run version:minor
scripts.release:patch: yarn run release:prepare && yarn run version:patch
scripts.branch:feature: git checkout master && git checkout -b feature/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:hotfix: git checkout master && git checkout -b hotfix/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:cleanup: git branch --merged | grep -v '\*\|master' | xargs -r git branch -d
